flawed_nl_solution:
If it takes on average 3 minutes to get dressed, then it takes 15 minutes total on the school week because 5 x 3 = <<15=15>>15
Thus far this week it has taken him 10 minutes to get dressed because 2 + 4 + 3 + 4 = <<10=10>>10
To tie his previous method, he needs to take 5 minutes on Friday because 15 - 10 = <<15-10=5>>5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
